name: World of Iron Birds - Warplanes HD
name_original: World of Iron Birds - Warplanes HD
description:
ARE YOU READY TO TAKE OFF?
Become a pilot ace of a classic British fighter aircraft and engage in combat missions.
Use your iPhone's tilt sensor to control your aircraft to smash enemy forces!

*Tips:
Use the third view for accurate bombing.
At any time in any mission you can return to the base for repair your aircraft or replenish bombs.

*Notes:
Compatible with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPod 5, iPhone 6, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad 4 and newer.
No payments in the game. One Price = Full Game

GOOD LUCK!
